tip: Take a deep breath. Inhale for 4 seconds, hold for 7, exhale for 8.
Drink a glass of water. Hydration affects your mood and energy levels.
Step outside for 5 minutes. Fresh air and sunlight can boost serotonin.
Write down three things you are grateful for today.
Stretch your body. Release tension in your shoulders and neck.
Listen to your favorite song and really focus on the melody.
Declutter one small area of your space. A clear space helps a clear mind.
Call or text a friend just to say hello.
Put your phone away for 30 minutes and do something offline.
Practice positive self-talk. Treat yourself like you would a best friend.
